name: Block Puzzle Brain Games
description:
The classic block puzzle brain game brings you a different gaming experience;
Circular three-dimensional rotating puzzle form, special augmented reality AR mode;

Click the screen to deform the square, slide left and right to rotate and aim at the position;
Slide the box quickly and it will fall down quickly, so that the box can be eliminated by enclosing it in a circle;

Classic nostalgic casual game time, don’t wait too long and start now!
